CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a material name, specifically a type of polymer (poly(3,6-bis(5-phenyl-2-thienyl)benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-alt-[3-fluorothiophene]-thieno[3,2-b]thiophene)
2. PC71BM: This is also a material name, specifically a fullerene derivative ([6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are PSFDTBT and PC71BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a specific type of polymer, which can be considered as a "Polymer Name" entity.
2. PC71BM: This is another specific type of polymer, which can also be considered as a "Polymer Name" entity.
3. 0.94 V: This is the open-circuit voltage of the polymer solar cell devices, which can be considered as a "Voltage" property.
4. 4.6%: This is the power conversion efficiency of the polymer solar cell devices, which can be considered as a "Percentage" or "Efficiency" property.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a specific type of polymer, which can be considered as a "Polymer Name" material.
2. PC71BM: This is another specific type of polymer, which can also be considered as a "Polymer Name" material.
3. 0.94 V: This is the open-circuit voltage of the polymer solar cell devices, which can be considered as a "Voltage" material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT (Polymer Name) |
| PC71BM (Polymer Name) |
| 0.94 V (Open-circuit voltage) |

1. "0.94 V" is the open-circuit voltage (OCV) property value for the polymer solar cell devices.
2. "4.6%" is the power conversion efficiency property value for the polymer solar cell devices.

2. "4.6%" - Power conversion efficiency (material property value)
